text: @PIBHomeAffairs @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @CimGOI @MIB_India @COVIDNewsByMIB @PIB_India @DDNewslive @airnewsalerts Government have allowed non essential commodity for the festival of Ramjan which is a great thing.I don't think that any citizen irrespective of caste want to spread this coronavirus. We all are ready to celebrate festival in lockdown like like Navratri was celebrated
